body_html: @gdeer81 can you check how long just your test takes to run on your machine? (You can do this via: bazel test //tensorflow/cc:gradients_nn_grad_test --test_filter=*LRN) On my machine, all the current tests run in < 3 seconds. Assuming your test actually adds 9 seconds to the total test time, I think it'd be good to shrink it even more.

body: @gdeer81 can you check how long just your test takes to run on your machine? (You can do this via: `bazel test //tensorflow/cc:gradients_nn_grad_test --test_filter=*LRN`) On my machine, all the current tests run in < 3 seconds. Assuming your test actually adds 9 seconds to the total test time, I think it'd be good to shrink it even more.
